ComicInfo.Summary:
The Black Flame: Zombies are found in the U.S. so a detective goes to Haiti. His girlfriend tells this to the commissioner, who is secretly behind the zombie conspiracy. The commissioner tries to kill the detective and his girlfriend but is instead killed by zombies.
Skull House: Two men are eager to get their old aunt's inheritance. One of the men poisons the aunt and frames the other man, who is killed by police. The aunt is still alive and she and the remaining nephew are murdered by the dead nephew.
Devil Mask: A man has loved scaring people with masks since he was a boy. He scares his girlfriend to death. He steals a rare witchdoctor's mask. When the mask is removed, his face has changed to look like the mask.
Red Lightning: A honeymooning couple stops in a town in which a vampire is said to live. While the man is out walking, he meets the vampire who turns him into a vampire. He returns to the hotel room and attacks his wife.
ComicInfo.Title: The Black Flame; Skull House; Devil Mask; Red Lightning
